tool_description: An API showing the latest snow forecast news for the United States, as well as five day snow forecast totals for Southern California ski resorts.
name: Snow Forecast News
title: Snow Forecast News

api_list.name: Get Snow Forecast
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the five day forecasted snow totals for Southern California ski resorts.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://snow-forecast-news.p.rapidapi.com/forecast"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "snow-forecast-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Snow Forecast News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return snow forecast news for all over the United States.
